title: Indiscretion: Volume Three
description: A summer of f*ck buddies? Something to take the edge off? I was down.But when Chloe shows up at my hotel door, wanting to rip my head off, rather than give me head—I cared. A lot. Too much, in fact.This is turning into more. And I can’t do more.Like the ink under my skin she’s becoming permanent. Enduring. Immovable. Was I ready to let her go though?Not a f*cking chance.Stay Updated: sign up for the Elisabeth Grace’s Mailing List. Bloggers can help out by spreading the word! http://eepurl.com/bli-LP
author: Elisabeth Grace
